org.jsonurl.text

Interface JsonTextBuilder<R>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - Result type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JsonStringBuilder, JsonTextAppendable<A,R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonUrlStringBuilder, JsonUrlStringBuilder, JsonUrlStringBuilder, JsonUrlStringBuilder, JsonUrlTextAppender

    public interface JsonTextBuilder<R>
    A thing that can serialize the JSON→URL data model.
    Since:
    2019-09-01
    Author:
    jsonurl.org, David MacCormack

      • add

        default JsonTextBuilder<R> add(Enum<?> value,
                               boolean isKey)
                        throws IOException
        Add an enum value.

        This is simply a convenience for add(value.name(), isKey).

        Parameters:
        value - an enumerated value or null
        isKey - true if this is an object key
        Throws:
        IOException

      • add

        default JsonTextBuilder<R> add(Enum<?> value)
                        throws IOException
        Add an enum value.

        This is simply a convenience for add(value, false).

        Parameters:
        value - an enumerated value or null
        Throws:
        IOException

      • add

        default JsonTextBuilder<R> add(CharSequence text)
                        throws IOException
        Add a string value.

        This is simply a convenience for add(text,0,text.length(),false).

        Parameters:
        text - the character sequence to add
        Throws:
        IOException
